body.name: ZENZSUAL Feminine Foam Cleanser with Hyaluronic Acid and Organic Cranberry Extract – PH Balance, Feminine Wash, Hypoallergenic Vaginal Moisturizer – Fragrance Free (1 Oz.)

features: FEMININE FOAM CLEANSER W/ HYALURONIC ACID BY ZENZSUAL – Hydration, balanced pH and a strong immune system are essential for feminine hygiene. With our gentle foam cleanser for women, you can keep your intimate area clean, healthy and odor free. Formulated with natural ingredients that aim at rejuvenating and rehydrating vulvar tissue due to breastfeeding, menopause or other conditions

PH BALANCE – It cleanses and freshens up the female intimate area while balancing the pH levels to alleviate odor and irritation. Designed specifically for your external vaginal area. Ideal for intimate wash and feminine care, pre and post-natal and during menstrual cycles when you are prone to utmost sensitivity

INTIMATE HEALTH – Soft foaming feminine wash for women effectively cleanses and moisturizes, leaving your private area smooth. It keeps your vaginal area hygienic and fresh after a workout, during periods or when having frequent discharge
INSTRUCTIONS – For external use only. Apply a pump on the palm of your hand and on the moist skin of your intimate area. Rinse thoroughly. This product is not intended to treat or cure any diseases

CAUTION – Excessive use may irritate the genitals and urinary tract. If you notice any reaction or irritation, discontinue use and consult your doctor. Avoid eyes, mouth and mucous membrane. Keep out of the reach of children

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Un cuidado de la zona íntima asombroso
reviews.reviewText: Enamorada de esta marca de cuidado de la zona íntima. Las creadoras son ginecólogas y saben perfectamente lo que hacen. Me a ido de maravilla tengo meses usándola y mi zona íntima esta hasta más encantadora que cuando Era más joven.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolute Best Feminine Foam Cleanser! Love it.
reviews.reviewText: This Feminine Foam Cleanser is the absolute best! Before I used to buy products from my local pharmacy and I ended up hurting my intimate area. One day, I saw a video with Dr. Klara Senior and Dr. Sofia Herrera and decided to buy the Feminine Foam Cleanser. At first, I thought it was a little expensive, but I said to myself, let me give it a try because I could not stand the itchiness, bad odor and constant gynecologist visits so they could tell me that there is nothing wrong, that I had no infection and that everything was fine. I kept thinking, how is everything okay? I am always dealing with itchiness and bad odor, this doesn't make sense. Fast forward to a week after using the Feminine Foam Cleanser with Hyaluronic Acid, the itchiness and bad odor disappeared! Thanks to both doctors who created these products! They really do work and the Feminine Foam Cleanser is not expensive to me anymore because it lasts a very long time, and the best part is that all my discomfort is completely gone!
